message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be a great fit for you.  I'm asking for $11,500.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. Let me know if this is possible.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $11,500 is already a very competitive price for this product. Could you meet me halfway at $10,750?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but unfortunately, I still cannot meet you at $10,750. My maximum budget is $10,000. Let me know if this is feasible.
